Content.Text:
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the <GREEN>tailor shop</GREEN>...
<PAGE>
What, uh...
kind of clothes do you need made...?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Uh...<MYNAME>...
You already own all the clothes I can
make here...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uh...<MYNAME>...
Right now I can't make those clothes
here...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Could you, uh...
come back once I'm able to make them?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I got the tailoring fee and the
items I need, so...
<PAGE>
Wait a little while I make them...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your clothes are...
done.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I sent them to your closet at home...
Uh, take good care of them...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uh... the last clothes I made for you
are all I can make here for now...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Could you, uh...
come back once I'm able to make
new kinds of clothes?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Uh... the last clothes I made for you
are all I can make here...
<PAGE>
Thanks for giving me the chance to make
so many different clothes for you,
<MYNAME>. It gave me confidence,...
<PAGE>
I hope you'll keep on... rooting for me
to do well in this business.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the <GREEN>tailor shop</GREEN>...
<PAGE>
Uh...<MYNAME>?
I make clothes here for men and women...
that you can buy...
<PAGE>
I think it's... nice to be able to wear
all kinds of different clothes...
<PAGE>
So... what kind of clothes can I make
for you today...?
